## AuthorizationMessageResponseBody type

AuthorizationMessageResponseBody is struct the represents authorization response data

**Signature:**

```typescript

    did_doc?: JSONObject;
    message?: string;
    scope: Array<ZeroKnowledgeProofResponse>;
};
```
